Definition: "Shared Services Organization includes all shared functions like IT,HR,Finance,Procurement,Facilities,Distribution and Contracts Management"
"Represents all the non-SSO functions like QHSE, Marcom, Sales etc. as well as enterprise initiatives and local support staff that are shared."
Software Integrated Solutions Products Creation provides software products to help solve oil and gas challenges.

"Software Integrated Solutions Services provides a powerful combination of disciple, application and integration expertise to maximize the value of the customer's investment in Schlumberger software."
"Data Services includes processing and analysis of wellsite data, including real-time services."

"NExT, the Network of Excellence in Training is a Schlumberger company that provides technical training for E&P clients, primarily engineers and geoscientists, on topics spanning Exploration to Production."

"Corporate Development & Communications New Businesses is an ""umbrella organization"" containing new businessesand coordinates with Heavy Oil engineering projects and other projects not of commercial nature."
Acquisitions and Joint Ventures represents newly acquired businesses or joint ventures within Schlumberger which have not reached a critical mass for a unique Business View.
"Management & Support represents that which can not be classified in a single segment, subsegment or business.  It includes corporate staff as well as the shared services organization."

IPM's Schlumberger Production Management delivers new field development from subsurface model to first oil and beyond and mature field re-development through long term incentive based commercial agreements.

"Framo began collaborating with Schlumberger on subsea multiphase metering technologies in 1998, and in 2011 Schlumberger acquired the remaining intrest in Framo Engineering to create the Framo Segment within Schlumberger."
M-I SWACO is  the leading supplier of drilling fluid systems engineered to improve drilling performance.
"Drilling & Measurements offers expert services for drilling, formation evaluation and well placement."
"BDT, created through a merger between Bits & Advanced Technologies (B&AT) and Drilling Tools & Remedial (DT&R) segments to accelerate our growth in the downhole drilling tools and rental markets."

"SLR offers designing, manufacturing and operations of land rigs. It will focus on technology innovation and the integration aspects of future land rig offering and drive our expanding federation of land rigs."
Integrated Drilling Services encompasses the entire scope of services necessary in constructing or changing the architecture (re-entry) of a single or multiple wells.

"Completions bring value to operators throughout the life of their well by minimizing risks with efficient and reliable installations, optimizing production with engineered completions, and maximizing recovery with advanced technologies."
Well Services includes production stimulation services and well integrity by means of cementing.
"Integrated Production Services includes the entire project scope necessary to abandon, maintain, or increase the production of a single or multiple wells."

"Artificial Lift provides centrifugal pumping systems, gas lift systems, surface pumping, and positive displacement pumping systems as well as real time production optimization, performance based contracts and lease, repair and exchange services."

Drilling Tools & Remedial Fishing & Remedial provides drilling jars and accelerators to significantly reduce the risk of loss of expensive equipment and the substantial costs of plugging back and sidetracking.

"Advanced Technology enables the design and manufacture of polycrystalline diamond (PCD) and polycrystalline cubic boron nitride (PCBN) rounds and precut pieces, custom-designed molding, and friction stir welding."
Drilling Tools & Remedial Drilling Tools and Services provides drilling and rig equipment to help ensure a successful operation.
Equipment Sales sub-segment focuses on selling DT&R and D&M equipment.
"Bits and Advanced Technology Smith Bits offers the most comprehensive drill bit product line available, allowing the most appropriate bit choice for any application."
Drilling Tools & Remedial Tubular & Surface Products offers a comprehensive selection of tubulars and surface products for any application.

"WesternGeco is the world’s leading seismic services company, assisting the E&P industry in exploration and reservoir imaging, monitoring, and development. Revolutionary Q-Technology provides unmatched reservoir imaging and monitoring capabilities."
The Integrated Services offering delivers managed and coordinated Schlumberger and third-party services and products.
"Wireline provides a full range of cased hole and open hole well logging services , delivering formation evaluation that accurately characterizes reservoir rocks and fluids."

"Geosolutions  brings together the people, the tools, and the technology to enable our clients to capture the benefits of a comprehensive and integrated suite of seismic processing and imaging services."

"WesternGeco Marine offers a complete range of high-quality conventional marine seismic services, covering 2D and 3D surveys over shelf and deepwater areas, seabed multicomponent surveys, and time-lapse 4D surveys."
Western Geco UniQ System Sales (USS) sells and leases the WesternGeco UniQ integrated point-receiver imaging system to seismic contractors and oil companies that run their own seismic crews.
WesternGeco Land provides comprehensive global resources for seismic data acquisition on land and across shallow-water transition zones (TZ).
Engineering develops new products that meet the needs of Schlumberger businesses and segments.

"REMS Supply Chain supports engineering, manufacturing and sustaining with world class products and technologies that help set our segments apart from the competition in terms of functionality, reliability, operating cost and operating envelope."

"REMS Research works to  to identify and evaluate hydrocarbon-bearing reservoirs; to bring hydrocarbons to the surface safely and cost-effectively,without harming the environment; and to maximize the yield from each discovery."
Manufacturing enhances Schlumberger's a competitive advantage by providing superior quality products when the customer needs them at the lowest possible cost.
"REMS Quality works closely with Engineering, Manufacturing, Sustaining and Supply Chain to ensure the achievement of objectives for quality, responsiveness and cost."
TLM optimizes the business viability of commercial products by focusing on the Total Cost of Ownership of Schlumberger assets and services.
"Geoservices, acquired by Schlumberger in March of 2010, provides a range of skills that help evaluate hydrocarbon reservoirs and optimize field exploration, development and production."
"D&M High Volume, historically known as Pathfinder, provides logging while drilling and measurements while drilling services and solutions to our clients."
"Regional Businesses operating under Drilling and Measurments, including Extreme, K&M Technology, Slider, etc…."
Schlumberger Well Intervention provides services that extend the life of producing wells by improving performance or providing access to stranded or additional hydrocarbon reserves.

"Well Services Well Integrity is also known as cementing services.  It is better described as well integrity since cementing is the ultimate barrier, and considered the only long term isolation by many clients."

"Well Services Production Services includes comprehensively profiling downhole flow, safe and reliable well cleanup and testing, perforating and completions programs, and real-time monitoring, control and intervention services to improve production."

"Well Testing Services Fluid Sampling and Analysis technologies ensure the customer has the most accurate measurements of fluid properties for reservoir modeling, well test interpretation, and fluid recovery design."

"TS Surface & Production Testing allows customers to control pressure and flow rates at the surface and shut in the well, accurately meter  fluids and collect samples, and disposes of the resulting fluids in an environmentally safe manner."
"Saxon, acquired by SLB in May of 2014, provides land drilling engineering and services expertise."
SLR Technology incorporates and develops acquired land rig business
"Rig Management  provides ""specialist rig management” to Oil & Gas Operators worldwide."
"Wireline Evaluation Services is a provider for Open Hole Services, Croswell Seismic and Microseismic services."
"Wireline Production Services is an integration of  cased hole services like perforation, mechanical, logging etc. and Slickline"
M-I SWACO Production Technologies  mitigate problems that jeopardize maximum production by offering a full suite of targeted solutions for all  production-related problems.
M-I SWACO Wellbore Productivity provides technologies allowing operators to drill safely and economically in sour gas and high-pressure environments.
M-I SWACO Industrial provides cost-effective drilling and environmental solutions for industrial and municipal projects.

"M-I SWACO Dynamic Pressure Management provides a complete range of pressure control solutions to safely manage the pressure barrier in the well, ensure wellbore integrity, and drill with reduced risk and greater borehole stability."
M-I SWACO Environmental Solutions provides land and offshore ecotoxicological testing services supporting all four M-I SWACO business segments.
"M-I SWACO Drilling Solutions customize drilling fluid systems and associated additives to reduce NPT in the most demanding applications, including HTHP, deepwater and depleted wells."
Artificial Lift Electrical Submersible Pumps represents a tried and true technology responsible for over 50% of the market share by lift type.
"Artificial Lift Gas Lift installations manage abrasive materials, such as sand, and can be used in low-productivity, high gas/oil ratio wells, or deviated wellbores."
Real Time services in Artificial Lift
Framo Subsea Flow Assurance provides advanced solutions for deepwater or subsea production.
Framo Subsea Surveillance provides monitoring and communication systems for subsea development.
Framo Engineering is the legacy Framo business covering product development and system supplier for multiphase pump systems and flow meters.
"Sand Management offers sand control to prevent the migration of reservoir sand and fines into a wellbore, stabilize the reservoir, and enhance productivity."
Intelligent completions obtain downhole pressure and temperature data in real time to identify problems in the reservoir or wellbore and optimize production without costly well intervention.
"Core Completions include high-efficiency driven systems to complex, custom engineered well completion systems, equiptment and accessories."
